name: A Quick Death
description: A Quick Death is a 2-Player local multiplayer Western Shootout where timing, reflex, and psychology are the name of the game. Featuring over 20 unique stages and over a dozen different obstacles and modifiers, A Quick Death takes a classic video game mechanic and pushes it to its most extreme conclusion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) Storage: 500 MB available space
